title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DraftKings: Meeting gaming regulations at Super Bowl scale with AWS Local Zones
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DraftKings：利用 AWS Local Zones 以超级碗规模满足游戏监管要求
abstract: Most companies view regulation as a roadblock to innovation, but DraftKings sees it as a catalyst for growth. In this session, we will share how the company built a scalable edge strategy using AWS Local Zones to meet Federal Wire Act requirements while accelerating expansion into 26 U.S. states. What previously took weeks now takes just days, saving millions in infrastructure costs while delivering industry-leading uptime, agility, and resilience. Learn how DraftKings transformed regulatory compliance into a competitive advantage, offering valuable lessons for Financial Services, Healthcare, and other regulated industries.
abstract_cn: 大多数公司将监管视为创新的障碍，但DraftKings将其视为增长的催化剂。在本次会议中，我们将分享该公司如何使用AWS Local Zones构建可扩展的边缘策略，以满足联邦电信法案要求，同时加速向美国26个州的扩张。以前需要数周的工作现在只需几天，节省了数百万美元的基础设施成本，同时提供行业领先的正常运行时间、敏捷性和弹性。了解DraftKings如何将监管合规转化为竞争优势，为金融服务、医疗保健和其他受监管行业提供宝贵的经验。
